Interactive Cleaning Game: Develop a vacuum cleaner that incorporates a fun and interactive cleaning game to make cleaning more enjoyable.
Personalized Cleaning Routines: Create a vacuum cleaner that learns your cleaning habits and preferences over time and adjusts its cleaning schedule and settings accordingly.
